nodes.text: In the last weeks of 8 ABY, Grand Admiral Thrawn raided the Draukyze system in a hit-and-fade attack with a single Star Destroyer in order to test his forces. The raid was one of a number of attacks on the border of the New Republic that were celebrated by the remnants of the Galactic Empire. The attack was a thing of rumor among smugglers, and was reported to Talon Karrde and Mara Jade by their copilot, Lachton, who was present at a similar attack at Bpfassh.
